header.title: Nutomeƒe ƒe Akɔtadɔwɔƒe
header.subtitle: Wò mɔ tẽ na Duŋgã ZOHRAN ƒe dɔwɔƒe.
header.login: Ge ɖe eme / Wɔ akawunti yeye

welcomeBanner.title: Wò Gbe, Míaƒe Du ƒe Etsɔme
welcomeBanner.description: Woezɔ loo ɖe New York City nɔlawo ƒe akɔtadɔwɔƒe si nye amesiame tɔ me. Se le ɖokuiwò me faa be nàna nyatakaka tso nutome kple du bliboa ƒe kuxiwo ŋu, nàlé ŋku ɖe agendawo ŋu, eye nàƒo nu tẽ kple Duŋgã Zohran ƒe dɔwɔƒe.

welcomePage.agendaDescription: Kpɔ nu vevi siwo dzi Duŋgã ƒe dɔwɔƒea le dɔ wɔm le fifia, tso mɔ̃ɖaŋununyawo dzi yi amewo ƒe dedienɔnɔ dzi. Lé ŋku ɖe dɔwɔna siwo le edzi yim ƒe nɔnɔme ŋu.
welcomePage.reportDescription: Èkpɔ kuxi aɖe le wò nutomea? Ðo fotowo ɖa, ɖɔ kuxia, eye nàɖoe ɖa tẽ na du ƒe dɔwɔƒe si ku ɖe eŋu.
welcomePage.chatDescription: Èle biabia aɖe ta dim alo nàdi be yeadzro nutomeŋutinunya aɖe mea? Ƒo nu kple Duŋgã ƒe dɔwɔƒe ƒe AI kpeɖeŋutɔ hena nyatakakawo xɔxɔ kple wò susuwo gblɔgblɔ.
welcomePage.newsletterDescription: Wɔ míaƒe kwasiɖa sia kwasiɖa ƒe nyadzɔdzɔgbalẽa hena yeyewɔwɔwo le Duŋgã ƒe agenda kple nutomeƒe ƒe wɔnawo ŋu.
welcomePage.subscribeSuccess: Akpe na wò ɖe wò akɔntabubu ta!
welcomePage.footer: © {year} New York City Duŋgã Zohran Kwame Mamdani ƒe Dɔwɔƒe. Gomenɔamesiwo katã li.

agenda.title: Duŋgã ƒe Dɔwɔƒe ƒe Agendawo
agenda.description: Lé ŋku ɖe dɔwɔna veviwo ƒe ŋgɔyiyi ŋu le du bliboa me.
agenda.searchPlaceholder: Di agendawo le woƒe tanyae alo numeɖeɖe nu...
agenda.noItems: Nu aɖeke mesɔ kple wò didia o.

chat.initialMessage: Esiae nye New York City Duŋgã Zohran Mamdani ƒe dɔwɔƒe. Míele afisia be míase miaƒe dzitsitsiawo kple tamesusuwo na míaƒe du gã la tẽ. Nukae le wò susu me?

report.uploadTitle: Ðo Wò Mɔ̃ɖaŋununya ƒe Akɔntabubu ɖa
report.uploadDescription: Zi edzi alo he eye nàda foto alo video kpui aɖe (sekend 15 sɔŋ) ɖe afisia
report.promptPlaceholder: Ðɔ kuxia (ɖk. 'aɖiba gbagbã le 0:05', 'wɔ goboɖo ƒo xlã do la')

feedback.prompt: Ðe wokpɔ kuxi sia gbɔ na wò dzidzemea?
feedback.thankYou: Akpe na wò ɖe wò nyatakaka ta!
feedback.commentsPlaceholder: Kpe numeɖeɖe siwo mele vevie o ɖe eŋu...

confirmation.title: Akɔntabubu la ɖo dzidzedzetɔe!
confirmation.description: Wole wò akɔntabubu la wɔm fifia. Àte ŋu alé ŋku ɖe eƒe nɔnɔme ŋu le "Nye Akɔntabubu Siwo Meɖo ɖa" te.
confirmation.locationPinned: Teƒe la de dzesi le akɔntabubu la me dzidzedzetɔe.

error.videoTooLong: Video la didi akpa. Meɖe kuku, ɖo video si le sekend 15 te ɖa.
error.invalidFileType: Faɛl ƒe nɔnɔme masɔ. Meɖe kuku, ɖo foto alo video faɛl ɖa.

login.loginToContinue: Ge ɖe eme be nàtsɔe ayi edzi
login.joinCommunity: Wɔ ɖeka kple habɔbɔa be nàdze egɔme

error.notSupported: Wò browser medea alɔ geolocation o.
error.unableToRetrieve: Míate ŋu axɔ wò nɔƒe o. Meɖe kuku, de teƒenɔƒe dɔwɔnawo dɔwɔƒe eye nàgbugbɔ ate kpɔ.
error.latLngRequired: Meɖe kuku, ŋlɔ latitude kple longitude.
error.invalidLatLng: Meɖe kuku, ŋlɔ latitude kple longitude siwo nye dzidzenu siwo sɔ.
